body:

Inspired by the **great** book [Getting Things Done](http://www.amazon.com/Getting-Things-Done-Stress-Free-Productivity/dp/0142000280/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1362907996&sr=8-1&keywords=getting+things+done) by David Allan.
